Albions triumph Personated in a maske at court. By the Kings Maiestie and his lords. The Sunday after Twelfe Night. 1631 Townshend, Aurelian, fl. 1601-1643.
[2], 22 p.
Printed by Aug: Mathewes for Robert Allet [i.e. Allot] at the Blacke Beare in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1631 [i.e. 1632]
Signed at end: Aurelian Tounshend. In verse. The play was performed on 8 Jan. 1632. A variant, probably earlier (STC 24155a), is anonymous. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
